Package de.fhe.ai.model

Class Traversable

java.lang.Object
de.fhe.ai.model.ModelBase
de.fhe.ai.model.Traversable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Connection, Station
public abstract class Traversable
extends ModelBase
A class that represents something that can be traversed by a Tram

  • Constructor Details

    • Traversable

      public Traversable​(int id, EventManager eventManager, TrafficManager trafficManager, float length, int maxWeight, float trafficFactor)
      Initializes a new Traversable
      Parameters:
      id - the internal id of the traversable
      eventManager - the eventManager used to communicate with the TrafficManager, must be non-null
      length - the length of the traversable in km, must be above 0
      maxWeight - the maximum allowed weight of a traverser, must be above positive or 0
      trafficFactor - the traversion factor, must be between 0 and 1.0f
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if invalid arguments are passed

  • Method Details

    • getLength

      public float getLength()

    • getMaxWeight

      public int getMaxWeight()

    • setMaxWeight

      public void setMaxWeight​(int maxWeight)

    • getTrafficFactor

      public float getTrafficFactor()

    • setTrafficFactor

      public void setTrafficFactor​(float trafficFactor)
      Attempts to set the current traffic factor of the given traversable, that is a percentage of a traverser top speed can be used freely while traversion
      Parameters:
      trafficFactor - the new traffic factor, this value should be between 0 and 1.0f
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the traffic factor is below 0 or above 1.0f

    • getTraversionTime

      public float getTraversionTime​(Tram tram)
      Calculates the time in hours needed for a tram to traverse this traversable
      Parameters:
      tram - the tram to calcualte the traversion time for
      Returns:
      the traversion time in hours

    • isTramAllowed

      public boolean isTramAllowed​(Tram tram)
      Checks whether a given tram is allowed to traverse this traversable
      Parameters:
      tram - the tram to check for
      Returns:
      true if the given tram can traverse this traversable; otherwise false
